    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Description copied from class: StandardGameObject
        Updates the position, state, actions, etc. of the StandardGameObject. Any logic or physics should be done within the tick() method. Do not put drawing functions in here; it will mess up the physics loop. This method must be implemented in any subclass of SGO.
        Specified by:
        tick in interface Updatable
        Specified by:
        tick in class StandardGameObject

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Description copied from class: StandardGameObject
        Draws the StandardGameObject to the screen however the user defines it as. Do not update any game/object logic in here. This method must be implemented in any subclass of SGO.
        Specified by:
        render in interface Renderable
        Specified by:
        render in class StandardGameObject
